item.title: AI weekly (03/2020)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Joachim Weise)
item.description: +++ Googleâ€™s AI language model Reformer can process the entirety of novels +++ World Economic Forum launches toolkit to help corporate boards build AI-first companies +++ Apple has quietly acquired low-power AI startup Xnor.ai for about $200M +++ Up to two billion times acceleration of scientific simulations with deep neural architecture search +++ Researchers propose system that taps AI to see hidden objects around corners +++
